ðŸ“– Summary: SAMPart3D is a Python-based project focused on segmenting parts within 3D objects. It provides tools and scripts for training segmentation models, utilizing multi-view rendering with Blender, and evaluating the segmentation results. The repository also includes utilities for highlighting segmented parts in rendered images and provides a dataset called PartObjaverse-Tiny.
